The application is the final deliverable of the **Coursera Data Science Specialization**. It aims at predicting from an inpiut phrase, what would be the next word in the sentence.

The Corpus is made of three text files extracted from https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/dsscapstone/dataset/Coursera-SwiftKey.zip

    1. en_US.news.txt file size is 205 811 889 bytes

    1. en_US.blogs.txt file size is 210 160 014 bytes

    1. en_US.twitter.txt file size is 167 105 338 bytes
    
All exploratory data analysis are available at http://rpubs.com/medhi/69821.
